statements: UPDATE waste_reduction_campaigns SET campaign_name = 'Spring Clean Campaign' WHERE campaign_id = 'cd35d8ee-9a19-4c26-b490-7dd0c7de3b64';

UPDATE waste_reduction_campaigns SET target_audience = 'Eco-conscious families', segment_criteria = '{"age": [25, 35], "location": "California"}' WHERE campaign_name = 'Green Living Challenge'
UPDATE waste_reduction_campaigns SET start_date = '2022-06-01', end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE campaign_id = 1;
